name: OR_CASE_SPECNEED
description: The OR_CASE_SPECNEED table contains OR management system case special needs.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the special needs entered for the case.

columns.name: SPECIAL_NEEDS
columns.description: The special needs entered for the case.
